ProductInfo.Features:
Mini DVR Recorder; Built-in motion detection. MPEG-4 video format
Resolution 640x480@30fps. Adjust record frame at 5, 15 or 30 f/s
Support SDHC memory card (up to 16 GB, sold separately)
Security Camera Feature: color CCD, 420 TV Lines ,3.6mm lens, 24 built-in IR illuminator
Package included: Mini DVR Recorder, day night vision security camera, power supply, audio video power cable and Pre-amp Microphone
